LabelText: Record indicators suggesting cloud account compromise (suspicious logins, config changes, new keys)
Identify the cloud provider and tenant/account impacted (AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.)
Immediately revoke active sessions and reset passwords for compromised identities
Disable or rotate exposed access keys, API tokens, or service principal credentials
Review recent cloud activity logs (IAM, audit logs, CloudTrail, etc.) for malicious actions
Check for new resources provisioned by attacker (VMs, storage, IAM roles, networking)
Confirm MFA enforcement for admin and high-privilege accounts
Remove unauthorized changes and validate configuration baselines
Document attack scope, services affected, and configuration changes made
